      • EnemyProjectile

        public EnemyProjectile(float xCoor,
                       float yCoor,
                       int size,
                       float xSpeed,
                       float ySpeed,
                       double damage,
                       double scalar)
        Parent class for enemy projectile creation
        Parameters:
        xCoor - Staring x-coordinate of the projectile
        yCoor - Starting y-coordinate of the projectile
        xSpeed - Speed in which the projectile moves horizontally
        ySpeed - Speed in which the projectile moves vertically
        damage - Damage that the projectile deals upon impact
